notes.text:
This update for python-Twisted fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-10109: Fixed an HTTP request smuggling issue (bsc#1166458).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In Twisted Web through 19.10.0, there was an HTTP request splitting vulnerability. When presented with a content-length and a chunked encoding header, the content-length took precedence and the remainder of the request body was interpreted as a pipelined request.
notes.title: CVE description
